Sentencas: Oxidation behavior of integrated interconnect with bipolar plate and corrugated sheet made by ferrite steel SUS430 is investigated and compared in simulated environment and in a realistic stack.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of metallic interconnect in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Electrical current is found to have a direction-related impact on the thickness of the Cr2O3/MnCr2O4 composite oxide scale.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of metallic interconnect in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Oxide scale of the interconnect aged in the stack exhibits a dual-layered structure of a complex Mn-Cr oxide layer covered by iron oxide.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of metallic interconnect in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The oxidation rates vary greatly depending on its local environment, with different thermal, electrical density, as well as gas composition conditions.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of metallic interconnect in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: By analyzing the thickness distribution of oxide scale and comparing them with the simulated test result, the oxidation behavior of interconnect in stack is described in high definition.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of metallic interconnect in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: ASR distribution is also conducted by calculation, which could help further understanding the behavior of stack degradation.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of metallic interconnect in solid oxide fuel cell stack
